summary: Adds the dremora horn models to the scar slider.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod so I hope I am doing things correctly. This mod adds playable dremora horns to the scar slider of just about every vanilla race with the exception of beast races. (may fix that later) It should work for either males or females too! The horns are located in the \'scar\' slider because I didn\'t know were else to put them. 

(note: Mod shouldn\'t change Cicero as seen in the screenshots.)
author: Tsalal
